lyrics:
5 contributorsone day at a time lyricsintro akon
akon enrique
redone konvict yeah
one day at a time
yeah its one day at a time

verse 1 enrique iglesias
saw you in the club
you were dancing with somebody
so close so tight
you were killing me so slowly
my friends were telling me what youre doing
can drive a man so crazy
i try to live my life
its been six months since you left me

prechorus enrique iglesias
so i oh i oh i
still thinking about you baby
i try i try
but i guess i gotta take it

one day at a time
i gotta let you go
one day at a time
it seems so impossible
one day at a time
i gotta let you go
and i know
yes i know
i gotta take it one day at a time
see enrique iglesias liveget tickets as low as 57you might also likebridge akon
one day one day one day
one day at a time
one day one day one day
one day at a time

verse 2 akon
im not the jealous type
but you stole my heart baby
dancing with that guy
made it so hard for me to watch baby
i just spinning around in them circles
im going through it in my mind baby
had to suck up the tears from my nostrils
to stop from crying out loud baby

prechorus enrique iglesias
oh i oh i
still thinking about you baby
i try i try
cant stop thinking about you baby
why oh why
i keep thinkin about you baby
i try i try

one day at a time

one day at a time
but it seems so impossible
one day at a time
said i gotta let you go
and i know
and i know
gotta take it one day at a time

first thing i gotta do is try to face it try to face it
but your voice keeps playing in my ear playing in my ear
it just makes me crazy tryna fake it tryna fake it
the true events so bad its not what i wanna hear
but i guess i gotta take it

one day at a time
i gotta let you go
one day at a time
